channel.title: Positivity on Sam Killermann's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Positivity on Sam Killermann's Blog

item.title: Positivity in the Face of So Much Negativity
item.description: I got an email with the above title and the following snippets, from a wonderful person who’s struggling with something I struggle with every day. In following your blogs and talks, I’ve been impressed with the positivity and humor that you project.
